players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost Alice so early in the game. Let us all stay focused and work together to identify the real culprit behind her untimely demise."
Diana: "Let's not forget that Bob is the mafioso and we should be cautious around him. We need to work together to figure out who else might be a threat."
